mainBoard.flavorText: Giants and pit spawn attempted to topple the cathedral's pillars. The fine grit of their remains still swirls in the breeze outside.

foreignData.flavorText: Riesen und Grubengezücht versuchten, die Säulen der Kathedrale umzuwerfen. Der Staub, der von ihnen übrig geblieben ist, weht immer noch durch die Straßen.
foreignData.name: Göttliches Verdikt
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine angreifende oder blockende Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Gigantes y demonios intentaron derrumbar los pilares de la catedral. La delgada capa de sus restos aún se arremolina con la brisa allí afuera.
foreignData.name: Veredicto divino
foreignData.text: Destruye la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Les géants et l'engeance de l'Abîme essayèrent de renverser les piliers de la cathédrale. La poussière fine de leurs cendres tourbillonne encore dans la brise.
foreignData.name: Verdict divin
foreignData.text: Détruisez la créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: I giganti e le progenie dell'abisso tentarono di far crollare i pilastri della cattedrale. La polvere fine dei loro resti continua a turbinare nella brezza all'esterno.
foreignData.name: Verdetto Divino
foreignData.text: Distruggi una creatura attaccante o bloccante bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 巨人や奈落の落とし児たちは、聖堂の柱を倒そうとしていた。 彼らの死体の塵は、いまだに外の風に舞っている。
foreignData.name: 神聖なる評決
foreignData.text: 攻撃かブロックしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Gigantes e crias do antro tentaram derrubar os pilares da catedral. A poeira dos seus restos mortais ainda esvoaça na brisa lá fora.
foreignData.name: Veredicto Divino
foreignData.text: Destrua a criatura atacante ou bloqueadora alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Гиганты и порождения преисподней пытались повалить храмовые колонны. Их истлевший прах до сих пор кружит по ветру.
foreignData.name: Божественный Приговор
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевое атакующее или блокирующее существо.

foreignData.flavorText: 巨人与暗渊魔裔曾试图弄垮教堂础柱。 他们遗体所化的尘埃至今仍随着门外微风打转。
foreignData.name: 明圣裁定
foreignData.text: 消灭目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物。

mainBoard.name: Divine Verdict
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

rulings.text: A “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.

An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.
Destroying a blocking creature won't cause any of the creatures it was blocking to become unblocked. They won't deal combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker (unless they have trample).

mainBoard.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"We're making progress, but its desire to explore still far exceeds its ability."
—Amadi, Halimar griffin-master

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir machen Fortschritte, doch noch ist sein Forscherdrang weitaus größer als sein Können." —Amadi, Greifenabrichterin aus Halimar

foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhält der Heranwachsende Greif bis zum Ende des Zuges Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: "Estamos mejorando, pero todavía su deseo de explorar excede su habilidad." —Amadi, maestro de grifos de Halimar

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous progressons, mais ses capacités ne sont pas encore à la mesure de son désir d'exploration. » —Amadi, maîtresse-griffon de Halimar

foreignData.flavorText: 「我々はこいつを上達させようとはしていますが、こいつの探索への望みは能力をはるかに超えています。」 ――ハリマーのグリフィン使い、アマーディ
foreignData.name: 巣立つグリフィン

foreignData.flavorText: "Estamos fazendo progresso, mas seu desejo de explorar ainda supera sua habilidade." — Amadi, mestre-de-grifo de Halimar

foreignData.flavorText: «Ну вот, уже лучше, хотя его жажда приключений все еще значительно превышает его реальные способности». — Амади, дрессировщица грифонов с Халимарского побережья
foreignData.name: Птенец Грифона
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Птенец Грифона получает Полет до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们有些进展，但他探险的欲望依旧远大于自己的能力。」 ～哈利玛狮鹫训师娥玛蒂
foreignData.name: 幼狮鹫
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，幼狮鹫获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

mainBoard.name: Fledgling Griffin
mainBoard.originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: The landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability (such as Rampant Growth) causes you to put a land onto the battlefield under your control. It will even trigger when a spell or ability causes another player to put a land onto the battlefield under your control (as can happen with Yavimaya Dryad's ability, for example).

When a land enters under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

mainBoard.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, Fledgling Griffin gains flying until end of turn.

mainBoard.name: Safe Passage
mainBoard.originalText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

rulings.text: Safe Passage doesn’t prevent damage that would be dealt to planeswalkers you control.
Safe Passage has no effect on damage that’s already been dealt.
Safe Passage prevents all damage, not just combat damage, that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
Safe Passage will prevent damage dealt to creatures that weren’t on the battlefield at the time it resolved.

mainBoard.name: Illusionary Servant
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Illusionary Servant becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

rulings.text: If Illusionary Servant becomes the target of a spell or ability, Illusionary Servant’s ability triggers and is put on the stack on top of that spell or ability. Illusionary Servant’s ability will resolve (causing it to be sacrificed) first. Unless the spell or ability has another target, it will then be countered when it tries to resolve for having no legal targets.

foreignData.text: Tant que vous contrôlez une plaine, les Ondins de Seijiri ont l'initiative et le lien de vie. (Les blessures infligées par une créature avec le lien de vie font aussi gagner autant de points de vie à son contrôleur.)

foreignData.name: Tritone di Sejiri
foreignData.text: Fintanto che controlli una Pianura, il Tritone di Sejiri ha attacco improvviso e legame vitale. (Il danno inflitto da una creatura con legame vitale fa anche guadagnare al suo controllore altrettanti punti vita.)

foreignData.name: セジーリのマーフォーク
foreignData.text: あなたが平地をコントロールしているかぎり、セジーリのマーフォークは先制攻撃と絆魂を持つ。 （絆魂を持つクリーチャーがダメージを与える場合、さらにそのコントローラーはその点数分のライフを得る。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク･兵士

foreignData.name: Tritão de Sejiri
foreignData.text: Enquanto você controlar uma Planície, Tritão de Sejiri terá iniciativa e vínculo com a vida. (O dano causado por uma criatura com vínculo com a vida também faz com que seu controlador ganhe uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.)

foreignData.name: Седжирские Мерфолки
foreignData.text: Пока вы контролируете Равнину, Седжирские Мерфолки имеют Первый удар и Цепь жизни. (Повреждения, наносимые существом с Цепью жизни, также заставляют контролирующего его игрока получить такое же количество жизней.)

foreignData.name: 塞基黎人鱼
foreignData.text: 只要你操控平原，塞基黎人鱼便具有先攻与系命异能。 （具系命异能之生物所造成的伤害，会让其操控者获得等量的生命。）

mainBoard.name: Sejiri Merfolk
mainBoard.originalText: As long as you control a Plains, Sejiri Merfolk has first strike and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
mainBoard.text: As long as you control a Plains, Sejiri Merfolk has first strike and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

mainBoard.flavorText: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.

foreignData.flavorText: Sceadas sind die kleinen Vettern der Drachen und dienen oft mächtigen Zauberern als zusätzliche Augen und Ohren in der Luft.
foreignData.name: Windsceada
foreignData.text: Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: Un primo menor del dragón, el draco muchas veces es visto junto a poderosos hechiceros que los usan como ojos y oídos voladores.
foreignData.name: Draco del viento
foreignData.text: Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: Petit cousin du dragon, le drakôn est souvent vu en compagnie de puissants sorciers qui les utilisent comme espions aériens.
foreignData.name: Drakôn des vents
foreignData.text: Vol

foreignData.flavorText: Cugini più piccoli del drago, i draghetti vengono spesso visti al fianco di maghi potenti che li sfruttano come occhi e orecchie volanti.
foreignData.name: Draghetto del Vento
foreignData.text: Volare

foreignData.flavorText: ドラゴンの小さな従兄弟であるドレイクは、彼らを空からの目や耳として用いている強力な魔術師の脇に仕えていることがよくある。
foreignData.name: 風のドレイク
foreignData.text: 飛行
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク

foreignData.flavorText: Primo menor do dragão, o dragonete geralmente acompanha poderosos magos que dele se valem como olhos e ouvidos com asas.
foreignData.name: Dragonete do Vento
foreignData.text: Voar

foreignData.flavorText: Дрейков, малых родственников дракона, часто можно увидеть рядом с могущественными волшебниками, которые используют их как летающие глаза и уши.
foreignData.name: Ветряной Дрейк
foreignData.text: Полет

foreignData.flavorText: 龙兽是龙的远房亲戚，经常在强大法师的身旁出现，充任他们空中的耳目。
foreignData.name: 风龙兽
foreignData.text: 飞行

mainBoard.name: Wind Drake
